document.full_text: while bitterly disappointed to stumble at the last hurdle of the indian wells atp tournament, rafa nadal was in confident mood for the next event on the circuit starting this week in miami.
document.title: nadal takes more pluses than minuses from indian wells
lines_and_colors: while bitterly disappointed to stumble at the last hurdle of the indian wells atp tournament, rafa nadal was in confident mood for the next event on the circuit starting this week in miami.
